Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 26th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1970...
Released by Los Angeles on 2/13/1970...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 3/1/1970 to a minor league contract.
Had first career hit (double) on 4/24/1970, off Herm Starrette (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/20/1970, off Chuck Nieson (MIN)...
Injured on 4/28/1971 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
